document.title: WEL_CHECKBOX
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/wel_check_box_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX control can take two states, checked or unchecked.
2Appearance A ../../reference/wel_check_box_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX
images/wel_check_box_unchecked.png wel_check_box_unchecked
A checked ../../reference/wel_check_box_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX
images/wel_check_box_checked.png wel_check_box_checked
